thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 6 of 457
thread.title: John Williamson

author: John Williamson
title: John Williamson
text:
Saw a car on line, was skeptical. Came into the Cobb Pkwy location & met Reginald. He was extremely knowledgeable and courteous.
Drove out in a 2009 Dodge Charger R/T, and couldn't be happier or more surprised at how smooth the transaction was.
I highly recommend them over many dealerships that I've been to in the past.
The entire staff was great. Truly a positive experience.
